text: The Dolphin is a passenger liner manufactured by Saud Kruger, produced from 3303 to the present. It is one of three ships in the Saud Kruger line, along with the Orca and Beluga Liner. The Dolphin is designed for passenger missions, with a focus on luxury cabins and long-range transport. It has a cargo capacity of 84 tons and a default jump range of 10.67 ly, which can be upgraded to 35.10 ly. The ship has a cost of 1,337,330 CR and insurance of 66,867 CR.

The Dolphin has dimensions of 51.8m x 20.8m x 8.8m and a hull mass of 140 tons. It has an armour rating of 198 with an armour hardness of 35, shields of 143 MJ, and a heat capacity of 245. The ship has a fuel capacity of 16 tons, a top speed of 258 m/s (default) or 290 m/s (upgraded), a boost speed of 361 m/s (default) or 406 m/s (upgraded), and a cargo capacity of 14 tons (default) or 88 tons (max).
The Dolphin has 3x Utility Mounts and 2x Small Hardpoints. It also has 2x Class 1 Compartments, 3x Class 2 Compartments, 1x Class 3 Compartment, 2x Class 4 Compartments, and 1x Class 5 Compartment.
